participant_1.name: Ella
participant_1.personality: Determined and ambitious, Ella has a strong desire to achieve her dreams despite her rural background.
participant_1.background: i was raised on a horse farm. my family has raised horses for generations. i dream of moving to the city. i want to be a lawyer.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Caring and insightful, David is deeply proud of his daughter's talents and seeks balance between work and family life.
participant_2.background: my daughter is a child prodigy. i enjoy going to the park. i am a doctor. i am now looking for a new job. my favorite movie is friday.
